description:
Nishikata doesn`t know what to write for his calligraphy class, so Takagi-san suggests they should both write what they want from each other.
Nishikata wants Takagi-san to stop teasing him, of course, but what does Takagi-san want from Nishikata?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Calligraphy / Seasonal Change of Clothing / English Translation / Pool
習字 / 衣替え / 英訳 / プール
